HTML:
She'll Never Come Home is Out Now!

The final single from Chapter One – “She’ll Never Come Home” – was released today.

“She’ll Never Come Home is the closest you’ll get to my heart in the whole EP. I wrote it in a history class years ago in a matter of minutes and it’s one of the rawest songs I ever wrote,” Hale stated about the piece.

Several different versions of the track were recorded before the final audio was chosen. The first demo went in a more upbeat direction and a lower key; the second demo took a more acoustic approach. It took several more attempts and style changes before the singer-songwriter was fully satisfied with the outcome and had created a track that he knew was ready to be released. Download “She’ll Never Come Home” now on iTunes and
